metadata.title: IT Consultant Challenge | Innovate, Modernize and Digitize effectively
metadata.description: The IT Consultant Challenge is an engaging team-based competition where participants step into the role of IT consultants. In groups of four, you are tasked with solving real-life IT problems by developing innovative, digitalized solutions for a client. This challenge simulates the dynamic environment of IT consulting, requiring teams to collaborate, think critically, and deliver impactful solutions that meet client needs.

about.title: What is the IT Consultant Challenge?
description: The <extrabold>{contestName}</extrabold> is an engaging team-based competition where participants step into the role of IT consultants. In groups of four, you are tasked with solving real-life IT problems by developing innovative, digitalized solutions for a client. This challenge simulates the dynamic environment of IT consulting, requiring teams to collaborate, think critically, and deliver impactful solutions that meet client needs.
The event is jointly organized by {netcompanyName} Vietnam and {codeMelyName} - a Tech community for young enthusiasts.
whoCanJoinAnswers: Are students from 2nd to 4th year studying IT, Computer Science, Software Engineer from universities in Ho Chi Minh City.
Have English skills as an advantage.
Have interest in exploring the roles of an IT consultant.
Want to meet new friends, IT fellows and IT professionals.

rules.title: Rules
rules.content: Teams select a case study from the challenge provided by the organizers, then analyze and design ideas and solutions to address the identified issues. Prizes will be given to ideas that are feasible, creative, and exemplify strong teamwork.
description: (1) After receiving the problem from the organizers, the teams come up with solutions/case studies to solve the problem posed by the organizers.
(2) For each solution, the teams need to analyze it from both business and technical perspectives. Then, illustrate the solutions with system designs under the guidance of mentors.
(3) After completing the task or when the allotted time is up, the teams submit their work and present their solutions to the organizers.
(4) The organizers evaluate the submissions, and the 3 teams with the most impressive solutions receive awards from the competition.

prizes.title: Prizes
prizes.note: (*) In cash prizes will be awarded in the form of Got It vouchers.

individual.title: Individual
individual.note: (*) The organizer will help you set up a team with other individuals

team.title: Team
team.note: (*) The organizer will add other individuals to your team in case you do not have enough team members

success.title: Congratulations!
success.content: Your application has been successfully submitted.

closed.title: Registration is now closed!
closed.content: We're thrilled by the overwhelming response. See you at the event!

teamSize.required: Number of team members is required

codeMely.description: <bold>{codeMelyName}</bold> is a vibrant IT community and launchpad for young talents, especially female programmers. Our mission is to foster a dynamic IT GenZ community by creating engaging competitions and platforms that enhance programming skills and provide top-tier talent for IT projects worldwide.

netcompany.description: <bold>{netcompanyName}</bold> is an IT consulting firm founded in 2000 in Copenhagen, Denmark. The company plays a crucial role in digital transformation for both public and private sectors. Netcompany believes that technology can have a positive impact on society and business, and continuously seeks talented IT professionals, offering career development opportunities.
